text:
Hi Justin, 
We pretty much have the same setup but will use Rioch copiers. Never thought
about pushing out the companion app which could open up some of the setting
missing right now with V4 drivers. Thanks! 
Take care, 
Anthony Meluso
Director of Technology
Watchung Hills Regional High School
108 Stirling Rd.
Warren, NJ 07059
908-647-4800 Ext. 4962
